DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study acquire clinical data require United States Food Drug Administration ( USFDA ) 510 ( k ) submission , approval new high resolution image system fluoroscopy/radiography . It expect new KALARE ( DREX-KL80 ) high resolution image system meet design specification . A minimum 30 case submit evaluation claim intend clinical application .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Image Evaluation DREX-KL80 Imaging System
DOC.criteria: Male female patient 18 year old Not pregnant Not safety risk patient Male female patient 18 year old Pregnant subject High safety risk subject Subjects and/or Legal Guardian Unable provide inform consent
